data.actual_result: The window shakes/moves around in a weird way
data.expected_result: The window should act properly without shaking
data.short_description: When you enter a number/letter in the code verification box for 2FA the box shakes a bit
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to User settings - Enable 2FA - Scan the QR code/enter the code on your phone - Try to enter the verification code from app on Discord
